function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Primary health care networks as an organizational base","Impact":"Risk of disease spread due to inadequate infrastructure and organization","Mitigation":"Investment in improving infrastructure and organization of health care networks","Technologies":"Health information systems, digital health platforms","People":"Local community members, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of drug resistance","Impact":"Possible increase in drug-resistant malaria strains","Mitigation":"Enhanced monitoring of drug resistance and development of new drugs","Technologies":"Laboratory testing, genetic sequencing","People":"Healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"National health and research institutions"},{"Description":"Intensive educational program emphasizing prevention and curative medicine","Impact":"Imbalanced focus leading to inadequate prevention or treatment","Mitigation":"Balanced education on prevention and curative medicine","Technologies":"Educational materials, digital health tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health education authorities"}]}
